At the beginning of the history of Resident Evil Revelations 2 fans expect dramatic return of their beloved heroine Claire Redfield. Having survived the incident in Raccoon City, as described in the previous games Resident Evil, Claire is now working for the organization "Terra Saves", which is fighting bioterrorism. During the party on the occasion of receiving Claire to work in "Terra Saves" unknown armed groups break into the office. Forwards stun Claire Burton and Moira, who was also present at the party. Later, they both come to mind in the dark and abandoned prison. Together, they must find out who kidnapped them and what sinister purpose. Will Claire and Moira escape and find out which is why they were brought to this remote island? Plot, full of unpredictable twists and turns, players make the puzzle at every step. Heading to a remote island-prison in finding lost daughter, Barry Burton meets an entirely new character - a little girl named Natalia Korda. It has unusual abilities that allow her to feel enemies and hidden objects. Using these skills together with proven skills of a fighter Barry, players will need to switch between the two characters to survive on a mysterious island and find Moira. Barry must expend ammunition and weapons wisely, as it should be in a classic survival horror - after all the terrible enemies await him at every turn. The story is told in Resident Evil Revelations 2, episode continues the original Resident Evil Revelations. Originally RER 2 will be coming out every week as a separate series for download, since 24 February 2015 Players will also be able to purchase a full season or a boxed version. Thus, fans will receive each episode as they become available, together with additional material. Each episode in the Resident Evil Revelations 2 includes content mode "Raid", as well as two fully ready to play scenarios that are dedicated to the heroes of the previously announced Claire and Moira and recently confirmed storyline Barry and Natalie.

Features:

"It is based on a licensed version of the game (Box Set). 
"Cut all except the English voice acting / no recoded. 
"Game Version - 1.3, there are 4 episodes + 2 extra episode. 
"unlock all the DLC released. 
Fixed all bugs in game ... for example Background bug and bug of mission 2 ... 

Install:
1.Run setup.exe
2.Install game.
3.Play. 

Have a nice game!!!
